title: one sided games
body: Is it just me or is it that every game I've played in ranked for the past month has been EXTREMELY ONE SIDED, it's either my team stomps the crap outta the enemy team or the enemy team stomp the crap outta my team, this results in me constantly winning 2 games then losing 2 games afterward, netting a zero sum result and stuck at a certain rank. When i say stomp, it's either my team doing extremely well (ie 1 or more lanes winning) or extremely bad (1 or more lanes losing). What can you do in these type of one sided games in order to improve your chances of winning?

replies.body: iv been stuck in B5 recently and cannot get out of the slump, I used to sit around B3 but recently it feels like im playing against faker and voyboy 8 / 10 games.... I feel like I cannot win a game just by holding my own in lane.. There is always one lane feeding like crazy.

I had a game with kat where we were losing (down 1kills to 6) early, but I didnt give up and roamed all the other lanes. Was a very close game, but eventually we aced them and pushed to nexus. In the ones that are one sided to enemy teams,  you have to make a huge effort to make a bigger impact on your teams performance - contribute and roam to make other lanes win.

Like you said, a lot of games are like this and you wont change the outcome. Focus on winning ALL of the close games, not changing the results of the one sided ones (Even if only 1 in 10 games are close, you can get a 55-60% winrate by tipping the scales in all of these)
